entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts, mentioned as speaking to Sirius and Snape. (Excerpt: 'Dumbledore made sure that the door was closed...')

entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: A nurse at Hogwarts, mentioned as having footsteps that have died away. (Excerpt: 'Madam Pomfrey’s footsteps had died  away...')

entities.name: sirius black
entities.description: A wizard and a member of Dumbledore's group, mentioned as being transformed back into his human form. (Excerpt: 'Sirius . . . if you could resume your usual form.')

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A potions master at Hogwarts, mentioned as reacting with fury and horror to Sirius' presence. (Excerpt: 'Snape had not yelled or jumped backward...')

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: A student at Hogwarts, mentioned as yelling at his mother and trying to calm the situation. (Excerpt: '“Mum, shut up!” Ron yelled.')

entities.name: mrs. weasley
entities.description: Ron's mother, mentioned as screaming and leaping back from the bed. (Excerpt: '“Mrs. Weasley screamed and leapt back from the bed.')
